    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void feedback(boolean getHit, boolean getDestroy)
      Plan next decision depending on how well previous guess performed
      void generate()
      Generates a new X coordinate and Y coordinate for the PC to guess Follows this general formula: Pick random spot If hit, search nearby spots for remainder of ship until a ship is destroyed or out of places to search Repeat
      boolean move(int dir)
      Tries to move in specified direction
      int nextX() 
      int nextY() 
      void reset() 
      void tryToMove()
      While there are still queued directions to search AND we can't move in current direction, make current direction = next queued direction If no more queued directions, generate random coordinates

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()

      • nextX

        public int nextX()
        Returns:
        the X coordinate of the next space the PC wants to guess

      • nextY

        public int nextY()
        Returns:
        the Y coordinate of the next space the PC wants to guess

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Generates a new X coordinate and Y coordinate for the PC to guess Follows this general formula: Pick random spot If hit, search nearby spots for remainder of ship until a ship is destroyed or out of places to search Repeat

      • tryToMove

        public void tryToMove()
        While there are still queued directions to search AND we can't move in current direction, make current direction = next queued direction If no more queued directions, generate random coordinates

      • move

        public boolean move(int dir)
        Tries to move in specified direction
        Parameters:
        dir - the specified direction to move
        Returns:
        true if able to move in that direction, false otherwise

      • feedback

        public void feedback(boolean getHit,
                     boolean getDestroy)
        Plan next decision depending on how well previous guess performed
        Parameters:
        getHit - whether or not last guess hit
        getDestroy - whether or not last guess destroyed a ship
